howIsItDifferent.title: How is Bonout different?
howIsItDifferent.answer: Bonout allows you to organize your events without creating an account, without cookies, we respect your privacy!

howToInvite.title: How do I invite people to my event?
howToInvite.answer: Once your event is created, you will get a unique link. Share your link by email or transform it into QRCode to invite whoever you want.

howIsItFinanced.title: How is Bonout funded?
howIsItFinanced.answer:
You can make donations, later we will offer paid features. Always without tracking and respecting your privacy.
We accept donations in cryptocurrency on the following addresses:

SOL: 4HDbY24XWbWg4mrkbrhr2ZFx8ifsZYtz6LHqwK9ABbgD

And on Binance:
ETH / BNB / BTC: bnb136ns6lfw4zs5hg4n85vdthaad7hq5m4gtkgf23 ​​Memo: 105915809

isAccountRequired.title: Do my guests have to have a Bonout account?
isAccountRequired.answer: No, you can just share your event link and they can respond with a nickname or name.

howToSaveUserID.title: How do I remember my username?
howToSaveUserID.answer: You can save it in your password manager or in a note. Otherwise, you can recreate a new one at your next event!

isThereAnApp.title: Is there a Bonout app?
isThereAnApp.answer: Not at the moment. If more and more people use Bonout, we will be able to create one with pleasure!
